name: Midnight (itch) (Bardon)
description:
When it's midnight the gate to this dungeon opens. Your mission: The evil wizard Azrael took famous computergames and made of them with his magic bad monsters. Nobody can play these games anymore, they are cursed! You must get all keys and then the games are rescued...

You move with w, a, s, d and with q and e you rotate. With space-bar you can hit with your sword. And with return-key you fly up for a short while  and can get an overview of the dungeon.
